meanings.definition: To indulge in an activity, especially eating, to excess.
meanings.sent1: After a stressful week, she started bingeing on chocolate.
meanings.sent2: He often bingeing on junk food when he's feeling down.
meanings.sent3: The cat was bingeing on treats like there was no tomorrow.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were bingeing like a rollercoaster ride.
meanings.sent5: The image of her bingeing on ice cream stuck in his mind.

meanings.definition: A period of excessive indulgence in an activity, especially eating.
meanings.sent1: The weekend turned into a bingeing session of pizza and movies.
meanings.sent2: His bingeing on snacks during the movie marathon was impressive.
meanings.sent3: The bingeing on video games lasted all night and into the morning.
meanings.sent4: The city was in a state of bingeing celebration after the victory.
meanings.sent5: The bingeing of colors in the sunset painted the sky beautifully.
